# LibraryAlbumSortProperties

**Protocol**

Album properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryAlbumSortProperties
```

## Instance Properties

- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the album on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the album to the library.
- **releaseDate**: The release date (or expected prerelease date) for the album.
- **title**: The title of the album.
- **trackCount**: The number of tracks for the album.
